metadata.name: Joshua Moore

persona.name: Marcus Green
persona.goal: Bundle business internet + TV for guest rooms; understand options and schedule a callback
persona.context: Renovation complete; upgrading guest experience; needs coordinated install and minimal downtime
persona.tone: Collaborative, asks about timeline and setup

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Impatient
emotion.description: Short, clipped messages; repeats questions; emphasizes urgency with “ASAP,” “now,” or “need this today.”

metadata.outcome: Appointment scheduled with sales for business internet + TV discussion.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet and TV for my hotel—can someone call me today with business pricing, options, and install timelines? I need to move on this ASAP.
Sure, I can set that up. Could you share your name and confirm this is for your hotel business?

messages: Sure, I can set that up. Could you share your name and confirm this is for your hotel business?

turns.content:
Yeah, this is for my hotel.  

Name’s Marcus Green, I’m the General Manager of the Lakeside Inn, 80 rooms. What else do you need to get me a call and a quote today?
Got it, Marcus. When would you like to schedule a call (date, time) and what’s your time zone?

messages: Got it, Marcus. When would you like to schedule a call (date, time) and what’s your time zone?

turns.content:
Soon as possible.  

Let’s do tomorrow at 10:00 AM Eastern. If you’ve got something earlier, I’ll take it, but I need it locked in for tomorrow at 10 AM ET at minimum.
Great, I’ve penciled you in for tomorrow, January 14, 2026, 10:00 AM ET. Could you share the best phone number to reach you at?

messages: Great, I’ve penciled you in for tomorrow, January 14, 2026, 10:00 AM ET. Could you share the best phone number to reach you at?

turns.content:
Use my cell: 972-965-3177.  

Also, can you confirm they’ll be ready to talk business internet + TV bundle options and install timeline on that call? I need concrete numbers and next steps, not just “general info.”
